description: '''Lyube''' ({{lang-rus|Любэ́|p=lʲʉˈbɛ}}) is a Russian [[rock band]] from [[Lyubertsy]], a city in [[Moscow Oblast]]. Lyube's music is a mixture of several genres, with influences from both [[Russian folk music]], rock, [[Russian chanson]], and [[Soviet songs|Soviet military songs]]. The band was founded in 1989, and since then have released sixteen albums. Lyube's [[Record producer|producer]] and main songwriter is [[Igor Matviyenko]].
